title: Quarkus and Maven
summary: This documentation section provides detailed guidance on using Maven with Quarkus. It covers creating, managing, and building a Quarkus application using Maven. Key topics include project creation, managing extensions, configuring development mode, building native executables, and using Maven for multi-module projects. It also explains the integration of Quarkus applications into different IDEs and suggests best practices for Maven settings in Quarkus projects.
